dashboard_subtitle: Free, accurate, and easy-to-use calculators for health, pregnancy, and everyday tools. Get instant results with our comprehensive calculator suite.
footer_copyright: © {{year}} Calcorda. All rights reserved. Made with ❤️ for better calculations.
about_us_p1: Calcorda is dedicated to providing free, accurate, and easy-to-use online calculators across various domains including health, finance, and general utilities.
about_us_p2: Our mission is to empower users by providing them with the tools they need to make informed decisions in their daily lives. All our tools are developed by experts and are rigorously tested to ensure accuracy and reliability.
contact_us_p1: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have a question, feedback, or a suggestion, please feel free to reach out.
privacy_policy_p1: Your privacy is important to us. This privacy statement explains the personal data Calcorda processes, how Calcorda processes it, and for what purposes.
terms_of_service_p1: By accessing or using the Calcorda website, you agree to be bound by these terms of service. If you disagree with any part of the terms, then you do not have permission to access the service.
analytics_subtitle: Real-time insights into calculator usage and performance.
help_intro: Find answers to common questions about Calcorda. If you can't find what you're looking for, feel free to contact us.
help_q1: How do I use a calculator?
help_a1: Simply navigate to the calculator you wish to use from the dashboard. Enter the required information in the input fields and click the 'Calculate' button. Your results will be displayed instantly.
help_a2: Our calculators are built on standard, widely-accepted formulas and are rigorously tested. However, for medical or financial decisions, they should be used for informational purposes only and not as a substitute for professional advice.
help_a3: Yes. All calculations are performed directly in your browser. We do not store any personal data you enter into the calculators. For more details, please see our Privacy Policy.
help_q4: How do I change the language or theme?
help_a4: Click the settings icon (cogwheel) in the top-right corner of the header. From there, you can switch between light and dark themes, and select your preferred language.
feedback_intro: Your feedback is valuable to us. Please let us know how we can improve.
cookie_policy_p1: This page explains how we use cookies and similar technologies to help us ensure that our services function properly, prevent fraud and other harm, and analyze and improve the services in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
cookie_policy_p2: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work or work more efficiently.
cookie_policy_p3: We use a minimal number of cookies, primarily for essential functionality. We do not use third-party tracking or advertising cookies. The cookies we use are:
cookie_policy_l1_text: We store your choice of light or dark mode so the site remembers your preference on your next visit.
cookie_policy_l2_text: We store your selected language to provide a consistent experience across the site.
cookie_policy_p4: Because we only use essential cookies for basic site functionality, we do not provide an option to disable them. However, you can manage and delete cookies through your browser settings. You can also manage your settings on our Cookie Settings page.
cookie_settings_intro: Here you can manage your preferences for our site. We use local storage, a technology similar to cookies, to save your settings directly on your device.
cookie_settings_p1: We store the following settings to enhance your experience. These are not used for tracking.
cookie_settings_note: These settings are essential for the site to function as you expect. Clearing them will reset the site to its default state.
calculator_bmi_desc: Calculate your Body Mass Index to assess if your weight is healthy for your height.
calculator_bmi_seo_title: BMI Calculator – Free Online Body Mass Index Tool
calculator_bmi_seo_desc: Calculate your Body Mass Index (BMI) instantly with our free, accurate online tool. Understand your weight category and get insights for a healthier lifestyle on Calcorda.
calculator_calories_desc: Estimate daily calorie needs based on your activity level and fitness goals.
calculator_calories_seo_desc: Estimate your daily calorie needs for weight loss, maintenance, or gain. Our calculator uses your BMR and activity level (TDEE) for accurate results.
calculator_bmr_desc: Calculate your Basal Metabolic Rate - the calories your body burns at rest.
calculator_bmr_seo_title: BMR Calculator – Basal Metabolic Rate Tool
calculator_bmr_seo_desc: Find out your Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR), the number of calories your body needs at rest, with our free and accurate BMR calculator.
calculator_body_fat_desc: Estimate your body fat percentage using the US Navy method.
calculator_body_fat_seo_title: Body Fat Calculator – Estimate Your Body Fat %
calculator_body_fat_seo_desc: Use our free Body Fat Calculator to estimate your body fat percentage using your height, weight, and circumference measurements.
calculator_macro_desc: Calculate optimal macronutrient distribution for your diet and fitness goals.
calculator_macro_seo_desc: Calculate your optimal daily intake of protein, carbs, and fat based on your calorie goals and diet type (balanced, low-carb, high-protein).
calculator_water_intake_desc: Calculate your daily water intake needs based on weight and activity.
calculator_water_intake_seo_desc: How much water should you drink a day? Our calculator estimates your recommended daily water intake based on your weight and activity level.
calculator_ideal_weight_desc: Find your ideal weight range using multiple scientific formulas.
calculator_ideal_weight_seo_title: Ideal Weight Calculator – Healthy Weight Range
calculator_ideal_weight_seo_desc: Determine your ideal healthy weight range based on your height and gender using several recognized formulas. Free and easy to use.
calculator_heart_rate_desc: Calculate target heart rate zones for optimal workout intensity.
calculator_heart_rate_seo_desc: Find your target heart rate zones for fat burn, cardio, and peak performance. Maximize your workout effectiveness with our free calculator.
calculator_blood_pressure_desc: Analyze and categorize blood pressure readings according to medical guidelines.
calculator_blood_pressure_seo_desc: Enter your systolic and diastolic readings to instantly check your blood pressure category (Normal, Elevated, High) based on AHA guidelines.
calculator_sleep_desc: Calculate optimal bedtime and wake time based on natural sleep cycles.
calculator_sleep_seo_title: Sleep Cycle Calculator – Find Your Perfect Bedtime
calculator_sleep_seo_desc: Wake up refreshed by calculating the best time to go to bed or wake up. Our sleep calculator is based on natural 90-minute sleep cycles.
calculator_pregnancy_desc: Track pregnancy progress, estimate due date, and monitor important milestones.
calculator_pregnancy_seo_desc: Track your pregnancy week by week. Enter your last menstrual period to see your estimated due date, current progress, and trimester.
calculator_due_date_desc: Calculate your estimated due date based on last menstrual period or conception date.
calculator_due_date_seo_desc: Estimate your baby's due date based on your last menstrual period (LMP) or date of conception. Includes key pregnancy milestones.
calculator_ovulation_desc: Predict your most fertile days and ovulation date for family planning.
calculator_ovulation_seo_desc: Pinpoint your most fertile days and estimated ovulation date with our free calculator. Ideal for family planning and trying to conceive.
calculator_menstrual_cycle_desc: Track and predict menstrual cycle patterns and fertile windows.
calculator_menstrual_cycle_seo_desc: Track your menstrual cycle and predict your next period and fertile window. A simple tool for understanding your cycle.
calculator_baby_growth_desc: Track your baby's growth percentiles for height, weight, and head circumference.
calculator_baby_growth_seo_desc: Track your baby's development by calculating their weight, length, and head circumference percentiles based on WHO growth charts.
calculator_age_desc: Calculate exact age in years, months, and days.
calculator_age_seo_title: Age Calculator – How Old Am I?
calculator_age_seo_desc: Calculate your exact age in years, months, and days from your date of birth. Find out how many days you've been alive.
calculator_date_difference_desc: Calculate the difference between two dates in days.
calculator_date_difference_seo_title: Date Difference Calculator – Days Between Dates
calculator_date_difference_seo_desc: Easily calculate the number of days, weeks, or months between two dates with our free online date difference tool.
calculator_baby_name_generator_desc: Generate unique and popular baby names based on your preferences.
calculator_baby_name_generator_seo_title: Baby Name Generator – Find the Perfect Name
calculator_baby_name_generator_seo_desc: Looking for the perfect name for your baby boy or girl? Use our generator to find unique, popular, and meaningful names.
calculator_password_generator_desc: Generate strong, secure passwords with customizable criteria.
calculator_password_generator_seo_title: Secure Password Generator – Create Strong Passwords
calculator_password_generator_seo_desc: Create strong, random, and secure passwords with our free generator. Customize length and character types for maximum security.
calculator_random_number_desc: Generate random numbers within a specified range.
calculator_random_number_seo_desc: Generate one or more random numbers within a custom range (min and max). Simple, fast, and free to use.
calculator_text_case_converter_desc: Convert text between different cases: uppercase, lowercase, title case, and more.
calculator_text_case_converter_seo_desc: Easily convert text to UPPERCASE, lowercase, Title Case, or Sentence case with our free online case converter tool.
calculator_word_counter_desc: Count words, characters, and paragraphs in your text.
calculator_word_counter_seo_desc: Instantly count words, characters, sentences, and paragraphs in your text. A free and simple tool for writers, students, and professionals.
calculator_character_counter_desc: Count characters and check limits for platforms like Twitter.
calculator_character_counter_seo_title: Character Counter – Online Letter Count Tool
calculator_character_counter_seo_desc: Count characters in your text instantly. Perfect for checking length limits for Twitter, SMS, or any other platform.
calculator_currency_converter_desc: Convert amounts between hundreds of world currencies with mock exchange rates.
calculator_currency_converter_seo_desc: A simple and free currency converter tool that provides mock exchange rates for hundreds of world currencies. For demonstration purposes.
